data: It was a nasty night, with a drizzling rain nearly as thick as a fog—a rain which obscured the signals and left the rails so slippery that a quick stop was almost impossible—yet just the sort of night to make a quick stop imperative if disaster were to be averted.

IT was a nasty night, with a drizzling rain nearly as thick as a fog--a rain which obscured the signals and left the rails so slippery that a quick stop was almost impossible--yet just the sort of night to make a quick stop imperative if disaster were to be averted.
